bibl.title: Papyri Michaelidae. Being a Catalogue of the Greek and Latin Papyri, Tablets and Ostraca in the Library of Mr. G.A. Michaïlidis of Cairo.
bibl.publisher: Published for the Egypt Exploration Society by the Aberdeen University Press
bibl.seg: Crawford David S., Papyri Michaelidae. Being a Catalogue of the Greek and Latin Papyri, Tablets and Ostraca in the Library of Mr. G.A. Michaïlidis of Cairo.
Aberdeen, Published for the Egypt Exploration Society by the Aberdeen University Press, 1955, 4°, xiii-166 pp. et IV pll.

C.R. par John Barns, JHS 77 (1957) p. 345. - André Bataille, REG 69 (1956) pp. 245-246. - Alvaro d'Ors, Emerita 26 (1958) p. 131. - G. Gualandi, Iura 7 (1956) pp. 283-293. - Marcel Hombert, AntCl 25 (1956) pp. 521-525; - ChrEg 31 (1956) No. 61, pp. 177-184. - Naphtali Lewis, CP 53 (1958) pp. 42-43. - Wilhelm Müller, Gnomon 30 (1958) pp. 110-114. - Claire Préaux, BibO 18 (1961) coll. 147-150. - B.R. Rees, CR N.S., 6 (1956) pp. 234-236. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 75 (1958) pp. 397-402.
